page.title: 12Pershore Police Station
page.content: We visited{Pershore Police {Station}as part of our{environmental {studies}project. We looked at a Panda car and a police motorbike which we were told all about. The police motorcyclist sounded the horn which was very loud. Both of the vehicles had radios to communicate with each other and report back to police HQ. We went inside and saw the {magistrates' courtroom.}We sat in the seats and took turns at sitting in the chairman's seat. We read the oaths printed on cards. We were told about the work of the{village bobby}and also the plain clothes detectives. A policewoman showed us the two cells where people were kept temporarily. Some of us had our finger-prints taken to take back to school.
